function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High urban density contributes to increased risk of contagious disease spread","Impact":"Higher likelihood of rapid disease transmission in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementing strict social distancing measures and increasing access to healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and managing population density, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents of densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Local government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Large household size increases the risk of disease transmission within families","Impact":"Greater potential for intra-household spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting household hygiene practices and providing education on quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices for early detection of symptoms, smart home technologies for sanitation and cleanliness","People":"Members of large households","Owner":"Public health agencies and community organizations"},{"Description":"Higher population size correlates with greater potential for disease exposure","Impact":"Increased pool size for potentially infected population leading to higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Enhancing public health infrastructure and surveillance systems, promoting vaccination and testing campaigns","Technologies":"Population tracking and surveillance technologies, vaccine distribution platforms","People":"General population in densely populated regions","Owner":"Government health authorities and public health organizations"}]}
